Description_lang: Colossus Smash and Avatar's base durations are increased by $s10% but their damage bonuses are reduced by $s9%.

description_blz.en_US: Colossus Smash and Avatar's base durations are increased by 100% but their damage bonuses are reduced by 40%.
description_blz.es_MX: Aumenta un 100% las duraciones básicas de Machaque colosal y Avatar, pero sus bonificaciones de daño se reducen un 40%.
description_blz.pt_BR: A duração básica de Golpe Colossal e Avatar aumenta em 100%, mas os bônus de dano são reduzidos em 40%.
description_blz.de_DE: Erhöht die Grunddauer von 'Kolossales Schmettern' und 'Avatar' um 100%, verringert aber den Schadensbonus der Fähigkeiten um 40%.
description_blz.en_GB: Colossus Smash and Avatar's base durations are increased by 100% but their damage bonuses are reduced by 40%.
description_blz.es_ES: La duración básica de Machaque colosal y Avatar aumenta un 100%, pero los bonus de daño se reducen un 40%.
description_blz.fr_FR: Les durées de base de Frappe du colosse et d’Avatar sont augmentées de 100 %, mais leurs bonus aux dégâts sont réduits de 40 %.
description_blz.it_IT: Aumenta la durata base di Colpo del Colosso e Avatar del 100%, ma ne riduce i danni bonus del 40%.
description_blz.ru_RU: Базовое время действия "Удара колосса" и "Аватары" продевается на 100%, но бонус к урону уменьшается на 40%.
description_blz.ko_KR: 거인의 강타와 투신의 기본 지속시간이 100%만큼 증가하지만, 공격력 증가 효과는 40%만큼 감소합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 千鈞潰擊和巨像化身的基礎持續時間延長100%，但是傷害加成降低40%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 巨人打击和天神下凡的基础持续时间延长100%，但伤害加成降低40%。
